name: The Adventure of Bobby
description:
Help Bobby beat the devil!

Controls: 

R - switch to menu
wasd - move
left click  - shoot
space - jump
alt+enter - switch to fullscreen (has black bars)
right click - read signs

(While you are in fullscreen and switch to menu by pressing "R", you will probably not see the menu, but you can still use it by using enter and arrow keys.)
